channel.title: About on U.S. Semantic Technologies Symposium 2018
channel.description: Recent content in About on U.S. Semantic Technologies Symposium 2018

item.title: Registration
item.description: News: We have reached the capacity limit for the event at 120 people. Please contact Pascal Hitzler (pascal.hitzler@wright.edu) to get put on a waiting list. Please use our registration site (closed) to register for the symposium. Registration includes lunches as well as coffee breaks with snacks. Until January 15, 2018 (early registration deadline), registration costs $150 for a regular attendee, and $75 for a student attendee. Registration cost doubles on January 16, 2018.

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: The following sponsors have expressed their financial support for US2TS 2018. . . . . . . . . . . . Google. . .

item.title: Contributions
item.description: As a symposium, the focus of US2TS will be on discussions and community building, and thus there is no paper track. However, everybody is invited and encouraged to bring an A1-sized poster to the poster reception. Please indicate during the registration whether you plan on bringing a poster as space is limited.

item.title: Venue
item.description: The event will be held at Wright State University in Dayton, OH, March 1-2, 2018. Further details about directions and transportation are available here. A map of the conference rooms and buildings is available here. The program will run from 8:30am-5pm on Thursday and 8:30am-3pm on Friday. The registration desk will be open from 8:00am on March 1, and will be located in the Lobby of the NEC (Neuroscience Engineering Collaboration) building.

item.title: Program
item.description: As a symposium, the focus of US2TS will be on discussions and community building, and thus there is no paper track. However, everybody is invited and encouraged to bring an A1-sized poster to the poster session. Please indicate during the registration whether you plan on bringing a poster as space is limited. The program will run from 8:30am-5pm on Thursday and 8:30am-3pm on Friday. The registration desk will be open from 8:00am on March 1, and will be located in the Lobby of the NEC (Neuroscience Engineering Collaboration) building.

item.title: Hotel
item.description: Hotel Reservation Reservations from February 28, 2018 â€“ March 3, 2018 Book by January 12, 2018 for quoted rates Hilton Garden Inn Dayton/Beavercreek 3520 Pentagon Park Blvd Beavercreek, OH 45431 Call: 937-458-2650 or 877-STAY-HGI mention US2TS when booking (www.daytonbeavercreek.hgi.com) enter dates and click Add Special Rate Code button enter code US2 into Group Code box Link Cost: $129 + tax per night Distance to Venue: 1.1 mile
